comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-47D serial 42-29209 of the 492nd Fighter Squadron, 48th FG, shows the wingtip damage while in the hands of LT Carl E. Falconer on 2 March 1945. The other ship, serial 44-19913 piloted by LT Edwin G. Boone, was so badly damaged thet Boone had to parachute to safety.
